title: Help ID Cool Vintage Sign Font
content:
Love this font found on an old Champion spark plug sign. Any help is greatly appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822094051im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-2_5355.png)
author: gregstarling

comments.content: Don't know this one. Alternatives: [Elan](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822094051/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/elan) Black, [Modesto](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822094051/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/parkinson/modesto), [Gargantua](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822094051/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/scriptorium/gargantua)

Vintage sign making--great stuff!  
No digital font to add to Ryuk's list but here is another "Spark" sign using the same mini serif lettering style. The [Vintage AC Spark Plug Tin Sign](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822094051/http:/www.etsy.com/listing/128259586/vintage-ac-spark-plug-tin-sign?ref=market) adds some lower case to the quest.  
Don
